objects.text:
25G Protein Per Serving
Delicious Milk Chocolate Flavor
63 Servings Per Container
Gluten Free & Non-GMO

product_details.description: Undenatured, Whey Protein Concentrate 5LBS of Chocolate Flavored Whey Protein Concentrate Per Bottle Delicious Milk Chocolate Flavored Whey Protein Concentrate Non-GMO & Gluten Free Made in a GMP Compliant, FDA Registered Facility Brand - Nutricost ** Flavor - Chocolate ** Servings per Container - 63 ** Item Weight - 5.7 Pounds ** Material Type Free - Gluten Free **

banner_details:
The banner presents a clean and professional layout to promote a whey protein product. The main headline ("heading") uses a bold, large serif font in a strong deep blue hue, commanding attention at the top. Positioned just below, the subheadline ("subheading") is rendered in a bold sans-serif font in a vivid orange, helping emphasize the product variant. Beneath it, a concise product description ("description") highlights its nutritional benefits in a minimalist, dark gray font. 

A prominent price tag ("price") in large, bold blue text provides clear cost visibility, while a call-to-action button ("cta") in white over a rounded blue rectangle ("cta_background") urges immediate purchase. On the right side, a large high-resolution whey protein container ("product_image") balances the text. The backdrop features soft waves and geometric strokes, with light cream and blue hues adding a health-oriented and modern touch.

**Color Palette:**
- Deep Blue: #0047AB
- Bright Orange: #FF8C00
- Light Background: #F5F8FC
- White: #FFFFFF
- Dark Gray (Text): #333333
product_color: The product image utilizes a bold and clean color palette that highlights key brand elements while maintaining a professional look. Dominant colors include a deep **Royal Blue** (#0056A4), used for emphasis on the cap, text, and side label, symbolizing trust and strength. A vibrant **Orange** (#F7931E) serves as an accent, drawing attention to the logo and side stripe, creating dynamic contrast. A rich **Milk Chocolate Brown** (#4B2E24) at the bottom reinforces the chocolate flavor, blending naturally with chocolate imagery. The background is a **Soft White** (#F8F8F8), providing a clean canvas that enhances readability and color contrast.
